*1059_Item_BookOfEulogies*.name: Book of Eulogies
*1059_Item_BookOfEulogies*.description: Passive: Restores 25 health whenever you kill a minion or monster (65 if using a melee default attack). Vampirism: 4% lifesteal (does not stack with other Vampirism) +5 Weapon Power

*1080_Item_MinionsFoot*.name: Minion's Foot
*1080_Item_MinionsFoot*.description: Passive: After buying this item, your very first attack on enemy hero will crit. +10% Critical Chance +5% Critical Damage

*1060_Item_BarbedNeedle*.name: Barbed Needle
*1060_Item_BarbedNeedle*.description: Vampirism: 8% lifesteal (does not stack with other Vampirism) +12 Weapon Power

*1066_Item_PiercingSpear*.name: Piercing Spear
*1066_Item_PiercingSpear*.description: Armorbreaker: +10% armor pierce (does not stack with other Armorbreaker) +15 Weapon Power

*1034_Item_SerpentMask*.name: Serpent Mask
*1034_Item_SerpentMask*.description: Passive: Your next 600-1200 (level 1-12) points of weapon damage to enemy heroes has +25% lifesteal, recharges over 40s. Vampirism: +10% lifesteal (does not stack with other Vampirism) Passive: Book of Eulogies +100 Weapon Power

spellsword.name: Spellsword
spellsword.description: Passive: Every basic attack grants you 4 energy (12 on heroes). +100 Weapon Power +35% Cooldown Speed +3 Energy Recharge

*1092_Item_PoisonedShiv*.name: Poisoned Shiv
*1092_Item_PoisonedShiv*.description: Passive: Every 2 basic attacks will apply a mortal wound for 2s. Vampirism: +8% lifesteal (does not stack with other Vampirisim) Passive: Book of Eulogies +40 Weapon Power +30% Attack Speed

*1067_Item_BreakingPoint*.name: Breaking Point
*1067_Item_BreakingPoint*.description: Passive: Gain 10 weapon power for every 160 weapon damage done to enemy heroes +5/10 (Melee/Ranged) damage needed for each stack thereafter. 25 stacks max. Decays 3 stacks per second after you've stopped stacking for 2.5s. +20% Attack Speed +55 Weapon Power

*1035_Item_TensionBow*.name: Tension Bow
*1035_Item_TensionBow*.description: Passive: Every 6s, your next basic attack will deal 240 bonus damage. Armorbreaker: +10% armor pierce (does not stack with other Armorbreaker) +60 Weapon Power

*1039_Item_Bonesaw*.name: Bonesaw
*1039_Item_Bonesaw*.description: Passive: Your basic attacks shred 5% of the target's armor for 3s. Max 8 stacks. Armorbreaker: +18% armor pierce (does not stack with other Armorbreakers) +15 Weapon Power +25% Attack Speed

*1014_Item_TornadoTrigger*.name: Tornado Trigger
*1014_Item_TornadoTrigger*.description: Passive: Your basic attacks shred 5% of the target's armor for 3s. Max 8 stacks. Armorbreaker: +18% armor pierce (does not stack with other Armorbreakers) +15 Weapon Power +25% Attack Speed

*1049_Item_TyrantsMonocle*.name: Tyrant's Monocle
*1049_Item_TyrantsMonocle*.description: +35% Critical Chance +10% Critical Damage +80 Weapon Power

*1070_Item_PiercingShard*.name: Piercing Shard
*1070_Item_PiercingShard*.description: Shieldbreaker: +18% shield pierce (does not stack with other Shieldbreaker) +20 Crystal Power

*Spellfire*.name: Spellfire
*Spellfire*.description: Passive: Abilities dealing crystal damage to enemies (excluding lane minions) deal 15-50 (level 1-12) + 100% of your cryrstal power as bonus crystal damage over 3s and apply Mortal Wounds for the duration. +90 Crystal Power

*1044_Item_Frostburn*.name: Frostburn
*1044_Item_Frostburn*.description: Passive: Crystal damage abilities slow enemy heroes by 30% for 1s. +85 Crystal Power

*DragonsEye*.name: Dragon's Eye
*DragonsEye*.description: Passive: Gain 12 crystal power each second you damage enemy heroes. After 4s, lose 1 stack per second. 18 stacks max. +85 Crystal Power

*1029_Item_Clockwork*.name: Clockwork
*1029_Item_Clockwork*.description: Passive: Upon damaging an enemy hero with an ability, reduce all cooldown by 6%. This can only occur once every 2s. +40 Crystal Power +35% Cooldown Speed +600 Max Energy +10 Energy Recharge

*1055_Item_BrokenMyth*.name: Broken Myth
*1055_Item_BrokenMyth*.description: Shieldbreaker: +30% shield pierce(does not stack with other Shieldbreakers) +80 Crystal Power

*1071_Item_EveOfHarvest*.name: Eve of Harvest
*1071_Item_EveOfHarvest*.description: Passive: Your next 600-1200 (1-12) points of crystal damage to enemy heroes has +25% lifesteal, recharges over 40s. Vamirism: +10% lifesteal (does not stack with other Vampirism) +55 Crystal Power +400 Max Energy +7 Energy Recharge

*1050_Item_Aftershock*.name: Aftershock
*1050_Item_Aftershock*.description: Passive: After using an ability, your next basic attack deals 14% of target's max health as damage with +50% lifesteal. Max 400 damage vs non-heroes. 1.5s cooldown. +25% Cooldown Speed +2.5 Energy Recharge +35 Crystal Power

*1069_Item_AlternatingCurrent*.name: Alternating Current
*1069_Item_AlternatingCurrent*.description: Passive: Every other basic attack deals 70% of your crystal power as bonus damage. +60 Crystal Power +35% Attack Speed

*1064_Item_Lifespring*.name: Lifespring
*1064_Item_Lifespring*.description: Passive: Regenerate 1.5% of your missing health per second whenever you are out of combat with enemy heroes for 5s. +300 Max Health

*1043_Item_ReflexBlock*.name: Reflex Block
*1043_Item_ReflexBlock*.description: ActivateL Gain a barrier worth 25% of your missing health and block all debuffs for 1.5s. (45s cooldown) Can activate while stunned. +250 Max Health

*1105_Item_SlumberingHusk*.name: Slumbering Husk
*1105_Item_SlumberingHusk*.description: Passive: Taking 25% of your max health in damage over 1.5 fortifies your remaining health for 2 (25 cooldown). +650 Max Health

*1046_Item_Crucible*.name: Crucible
*1046_Item_Crucible*.description: Activate: Trigger Reflex Block for you and nearby teammates. (45s cooldown) +700 Max Health

*1045_Item_FountainOfRenewal*.name: Fountain of Renewal
*1045_Item_FountainOfRenewal*.description: Passive: Lifespring Activate: Heals you and nearby allies for 2.5 health for each % missing health per second for 3s. (65s cooldown) +300 Max Health +65 Shield +20 Armor

*1063_Item_Aegis*.name: Aegis
*1063_Item_Aegis*.description: Activate: Reflex Block (35s cooldown) +85 Shield +25 Armor +250 Max Health

*1057_Item_AtlasPauldron*.name: Atlas Pauldron
*1057_Item_AtlasPauldron*.description: Activate: Maim nearby enemies, lowering their attack speed by 50% of their total for 4s in a 4-meter range. (20s cooldown) +80 Armor + 25 Shield

*1030_Item_SprintBoots*.name: Sprint Boots
*1030_Item_SprintBoots*.description: Boots: +0.4 move speed (does not stack) Activate: Sprint for 2s (150s cooldown).

*1032_Item_TravelBoots*.name: Travel Boots
*1032_Item_TravelBoots*.description: Boots: +0.4 move speed (does not stack) Travel Boots: +1 move speed when not in combat. Activate: Spring for 2 (90s cooldown). +100 Max Health

*1088_Item_Flaregun*.name: Flare Gun
*1088_Item_Flaregun*.description: Activate: Fire a flare. 5s cooldown. 2 charges Max. 20s per charge. +300 Max Health

*1074_Item_StormguardBanner*.name: Stormguard Banner
*1074_Item_StormguardBanner*.description: Stormguard: Basic attacks deal 10-60 (level 1-12) bonus true damage per second. 15% effectiveness against heroes and structures. (Does not stack with other Stormguard) +250 Max Health

*1047_Item_JourneyBoots*.name: Journey Boots
*1047_Item_JourneyBoots*.description: Boots: +0.6 move speed (does not stack) Passive: Travel Boots Activate: Sprint for 2s (60s cooldown). Damaging heroes instantly sets the cooldown to 12s if it is above it. +250 Max Health

*1056_Item_WarTreads*.name: War Treads
*1056_Item_WarTreads*.description: Boots: +0.4 move speed (does not stack) Passive: Travel Boots Activate: Grant a sprint to all nearby teammates for 2s (60s cooldown). +500 Max Health

*1087_Item_HalcyonChargers*.name: Halcyon Chargers
*1087_Item_HalcyonChargers*.description: Boots: +0.5 move speed (does not stack) Passive: Travel Boots Activate: Sprint for 3s (50s cooldown). +150 Max Health +15% Cooldown Speed +350 Max Energy +6 Energy Recharge

*1097_Item_Echo*.name: Echo
*1097_Item_Echo*.description: Activate: The last ability to be put on cooldown is refreshed  (150% of ability's cooldown +10s cooldown). +350 Max Energy +6 Energy Recharge

*1079_Item_Contraption*.name: Contraption
*1079_Item_Contraption*.description: Activate: Target yourself to palce a Scout Trap. Target the ground farther away to fire a Flare. 5s cooldown. 4 charges max. 20s per charge. +450 Max Health +30% Cooldown Speed +3 Energy Recharge

*1090_Item_Stormcrown*.name: Stormcrown
*1090_Item_Stormcrown*.description: Stormguard: Basic attacks deal 50-160 (level 1-12) bonus true damage per second. 25% effectiveness against heroes and structures. (Does not stack with other Stormguard) +20% Cooldown Speed +4 Energy Recharge +300 Max Health

*1095_Item_NullwaveGauntlet*.name: Nullwave Gauntlet
*1095_Item_NullwaveGauntlet*.description: Activate: Fires a blast at an enemy hero whih explodes shortly after hitting its target, item silencing for 4s and dealing 50-100 + 15% max health in crystal damage (35s cooldown) +500 Max Health +25% Cooldown Speed +4 Energy Recharge

*1042_Item_Shiversteel*.name: Shiversteel
*1042_Item_Shiversteel*.description: Activate: For the next 4s (6s if you are melee), your basic attacks slow enemy heroes by 40% for 1.4s. (12s cooldown) +650 Max Health +30% Attack Speed

Healing Flask.name: Healing Flask
Healing Flask.description: Activate: Block 115-500 (level 1-12) damage and recover 200-475 (level1-12) health and 30% energy over the next 5s (120s cooldown)

*1038_Item_Flare*.name: Flare
*1038_Item_Flare*.description: Consume: Reveal an area for 5s. Can see over walls, into brush, and stealthed units. Scout Traps within this area are permanently revealed.

*1054_Item_ScoutTrap*.name: Scout Trap
*1054_Item_ScoutTrap*.description: Consume: Place a trap at your feet. Trap grants vision & will explode on contact with enemy heroes after a short delay. Deals splash damage and reveals affected enemies for 5s.

*1041_Item_MinionCandy*.name: Minion Candy
*1041_Item_MinionCandy*.description: Consumer: Emporers nearby friendly minions for 60s and friendly jungle bosses for 30s. They are granted 40% increased damage, 120 armor, 60 shield, and 0.5 increased movement speed.

*1073_Item_IronguardContract*.name: Ironguard Contract
*1073_Item_IronguardContract*.description: Passive: When a nearby ally kills a jungle monster or large lane minion, it heals you and your ally by 75 health and 10 energy each.

1084_Item_ProtectorContract*.name: Protector Contract
1084_Item_ProtectorContract*.description: Activate: Grant an 120 health barrier to nearby allied heroes for 2s. 5s cooldown. 2 max charges, 15s per charge.

DragonbloodContract.name: Dragonblood Contract
DragonbloodContract.description: Activate: After a brief delay, neary enemy heroes are marked for 3s. The next basic attack from an ally consumes the mark, slowing by 30% for 2s and dealing 100 bonus crystal damage. 10s cooldown. 2 max charges. 25s per charge

*1052_Item_WeaponInfusion*.name: Weapon Infusion
*1052_Item_WeaponInfusion*.description: Consume: Temporarily gain 20-80 weapon power, 5%-20% attack speed, and 0-15 armor & shield based on your level. Last 150s. Can only have one infusion at a time.

*1053_Item_CrystalInfusion*.name: Crystal Infusion
*1053_Item_CrystalInfusion*.description: Consume: Temporarily gain 20-80 crystal power, 10%-30% cooldown speed, and 0-15 armor & shield based on your level. Last 150s. Can only have one infusion at a time.

Flare Loader.name: Flare Loader
Flare Loader.description: Activate: Fires a Flare that last 3s, granting vision and true sight in the area. Flares have 3 max charges and recover 1 charge every 75s. +150 Max Health

ScoutPak.name: Scout Pak
ScoutPak.description: Breadth: You can hold 1 additional Scout Cam(s) and obtain charges 30s faster per Scout Cam. +20% Cooldown Speed +2.5 Energy Recharge

ScoutTuff.name: Scout Tuff
ScoutTuff.description: Depth: Scout Cam last 30s longer and take 1 extra hit(s) to kill +250 max Health

SuperScout.name: SuperScout
SuperScout.description: Breadth: You can hold 3 additional Scout Cam(s) and obtain charges 60s faster per Scout Cam. Depth: Scout Cam last 60s longer and take 3 extra hit(s) to kill. +500 Max Health +25% Cooldown Speed +5 Energy Recharge
